Html:
Hello,

i have a Problem with different Windows languages and e.g. Flash .
On my german Language Pc the update appear and run normal.

On my French and english Version´s of Windows 10 the dont appear.
In the update description are all languages supported.

Does somebody now why this happen?

i found the error. Somehow the plugin was uninstalled.
But what rule is it to install it in any way, even when it´s not installed?
